data.name: Demon
data.description:
The Chaos - Demon [W]
Units:
+12% damage
+30% buy cost

Buildings:
+2 armor

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage
+10% cost

Magic:
Death Coil (Instantly heals unit for 125 HP)
Rain of Fel (Deals 100 damage in 200 AoE)
Animate Dead (Raises 1 dead unit for 30s)

Traits: Extremely powerful with no real weaknesses. Demons reign in their realm virtually unchalanged. Luckily this is not their realm and keeping dimensional portals open for the supplylines is very expensive.

Difficulty: Beginer

auras.name: Reconstruction Aura
auras.description:
+1 HP/s building regeneration
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Soul Harvest
auras.description:
+20% life steal, +10% damage
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Corruption Aura
auras.description:
-8 unit armor, +100 range buldings
(does not affect Special unit)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Dark Lord Himself [Q]
bonuses.description:
Archimonde replaces Kazzak

Special Unit (Ranged)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Finger of Death (Damage Spell)
400-550 damage, 10-16 units
(45 second cooldown)

Chaos Rift (Summoning Spell)
summons Demon reinforcement every 15s
(60-90 second cooldown)

Intimidation Aura (Disable Aura)
13-25% attack rate reduction
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Rain of Chaos (Summoning Spell)
summons 3 Infernals for 60-90s
(120 second cooldown)

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Legion's Vanguard [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Vile Blood

Reduces spell damage to Felguard, Succubus, Diabolist and Fel Stalker by 20%, increases their hit points by 25.

Type: Anti Magic / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Orb of Corruption [E]
bonuses.description:
Increases Felguard, Diabolist and Fel Stalker attack rate by 7% and allows them to reduce their target's armor by 4/6/8 for 45 seconds.
(upgrades together with Chaos Citadel)
(does not affect Special unit)

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Sargeras First Chosen [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Mass Curse

Eredar Witch replaces Diabolist
Spellcaster
+5% attack rate
+50 HP
+75 MP
Abilities:
Finger of Death (Damage Spell)
(50/75/100/125 dmg to 1 unit)
Void Rift (Summoning Spell)
(1 unit for 20/25/30/35s)
Upgrades used:
Fel Magic (Upgrades Abilities)
Corrupted Armor
Mass Curse

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Void Creatures [F]
bonuses.description:

+1 level of Hysteria

Nether Drake replaces Destroyer
Air Unit
+200 HP
Abilities:

(15% to deal 2.5x damage)

(deals damage to spellcasters)
(1x damage per spent MP)

Corrupted Armor
Hysteria
Devour Magic

bonuses.description:

+1 level of Fear Aura

(25% attack rate reduction)

Corrupted Armor

Icreases Citadel and Diabolist mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Citadel spells by 30%.

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

towerUpgrades.name: Cleaving Attack
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: splash damage in 125 AoE
Affects: Felguard

Lv1: 12% area damage
Lv2: 24% area damage
Lv3: 36% area damage
Lv4: 48% area damage

spells.name: Cleaving Attack (Lv1)
spells.description: Unit strikes with such force that 12% of it's damage strikes through to enemies near the primary attacked unit.

towerUpgrades.name: Vile Blood
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage/sec in 150 AoE
Affects: Felguard and Succubus

Lv1: 8 damage per second
Lv2: 16 damage per second
Lv3: 24 damage per second
Lv4: 32 damage per second

towerUpgrades.name: Vorpal Daggers
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to hinder enemy units
Affects: Succubus
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 50 dmg, 15% slow for 10 sec, 60 CD
Lv2: 75 dmg, 15% slow for 10 sec, 50 CD
Lv3: 100 dmg, 15% slow for 10 sec, 40 CD
Lv4: 125 dmg, 15% slow for 10 sec, 30 CD

spells.name: Shadow Strike
spells.description: Deal 50 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Mass Curse
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to curse enemies in an area
Affects: Diabolist
(200 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special Unit)

Lv1: 10% chance to miss for 5 sec
Lv2: 20% chance to miss for 10 sec
Lv3: 30% chance to miss for 15 sec
Lv4: 40% chance to miss for 20 sec

spells.name: Phase Shift (Lv1)
spells.description: Causes this unit to shift out of existence whenever it takes damage, temporarily avoiding any further damage.

spells.name: Mass Curse 1 lvl
spells.description: 10% chance to miss for 5sec

towerUpgrades.name: Fear Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces enemy damage
Affects: Fel Stalker
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: -10% damage in 400 AoE
Lv2: -20% damage in 500 AoE
Lv3: -30% damage in 600 AoE
Lv4: -40% damage in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Spiked Skin
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor and damage return
Affects: Fel Stalker

Lv1: +2 armor, 10 damage to melee attacker
Lv2: +4 armor, 20 damage to melee attacker
Lv3: +6 armor, 30 damage to melee attacker
Lv4: +8 armor, 40 damage to melee attacker

towerUpgrades.name: Hysteria
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces target's attack rate
Affects: Destroyer and Chaos Tower
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: -10% attack rate for 10 seconds
Lv2: -20% attack rate for 12 seconds
Lv3: -30% attack rate for 14 seconds
Lv4: -40% attack rate for 16 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Devour Magic
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: dispels buffs in an area
Affects: Fel Stalker and Destroyer
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 100 AoE, heals 20 HP per buff
Lv2: 125 AoE, heals 40 HP per buff
Lv3: 150 AoE, heals 60 HP per buff
Lv4: 175 AoE, heals 80 HP per buff

spells.name: Devour Magic (Lv1)
spells.description: Consumes all magical buffs from units in an area. Each unit that is devoured of magic gives 20 hit points.

towerUpgrades.name: Soul Echo
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage when killed
Affects: Your Heroes
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 250 damage, 2 second stun
Lv2: 500 damage, 3 second stun
Lv3: 750 damage, 4 second stun
Lv4: 1000 damage, 5 second stun

heroes.name: Pit Lord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
War Stomp (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4s stun
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)
10-30% area damage

Corruption Aura (Disable Aura)
2-8 armor reduction
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Inferno (Summoning Spell)
summons Infernal for 30-90s
(60-120 second cooldown)

skills.name: War Stomp - [Level 5]
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AOws,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and stunning them for <AOws,Dur4> seconds.

skills.name: Cleaving Attack - [Level 4]
skills.description: The Hero strikes with such force that <ANca,DataA4,%>% of his damage strikes through to enemies near the primary attacked unit.

skills.name: Rain of Chaos - [Level 1]
skills.description: Calls down multiple Infernals from the sky.

heroes.name: Dreadlord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Carrion Swarm (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)
(30 second cooldown)

Death Coil (Healing Spell)
200-500 HP to 3 units
(25 second cooldown)

Vampiric Aura (Support Aura)
18-30% melee lifesteal
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Demonic Fortitude (Damage Skill)
Blocks dmg for 7s, then deals 175-325 dmg
(40 second cooldown)

skills.name: Carrion Swarm - [Level 4]
skills.description: Sends a horde of bats to deal <AUcs,DataA4> damage to each enemy unit in a cone.

skills.name: Death Coil - [Level 4]
skills.description: Heals up to 3 units for 200 hit points.

skills.name: Demonic Fortitude 1 lvl
skills.description: Takes 100% less damage for 7 second.

(60 second cooldown)
